exercise_description: Design a simple RESTful API for managing a collection of books in a library. The API should support the following operations: adding a new book, retrieving a list of all books, and retrieving details of a specific book by its ID. Each book should have a title, author, and publication year.
agent_feedback:
Great job on correctly implementing the Fibonacci sequence and handling the base cases effectively! To improve, consider optimizing your recursive approach for larger values of n and adding comments to clarify your logic, as well as handling edge cases like negative inputs. You're on the right track—keep up the good work!

Note: I notice you submitted code that doesn't match the exercise I provided (Design a simple RESTful API for managing a collection of books in a library. The API should support ...). I'll review what you submitted, but I'd also like to see your solution to the original exercise when you're ready.

How would you implement input validation to handle negative numbers in your function?
